name: NWProtocolFramer.Message
desc: A message for a custom protocol, in which you can store arbitrary key-value pairs.

items.name: init(definition: NWProtocolFramer.Definition)
items.desc: Initializes an empty message for a custom framer definition.

items.name: init(instance: NWProtocolFramer.Instance)
items.desc: Initializes an empty message from within a framer implementation.

items.name: subscript(String) -> Any?
items.desc: Get and set object values in a custom framer message.
